action.name: Set text
action.param: "This is a pre-alpha demo, so no features are final and some may be broken."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I'll be standing around the place to give you helpful hints, so keep an eye out for me."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Grab the key from that chest round the corner first, you're gonna need it!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You must first prove yourself before you can proceed."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Press the 'i' key to view your inventory."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Items you collect get stored there, and you can view how many keys you've collected too."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "All is not as it seems in these places..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Use your 'Fine Grain Revealing Salts' to guide you across the hidden path."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Press 'Q' to throw a handful of the salt in front of you; wherever it sticks is safe to walk across!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Remember that key you got from the chest at the entrance?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You grabbed the key right? Ok, well, you can use it to open wooden doors like this one."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Once you use a key, it is lost forever. Lock craftsmanship here in Jorokiim isn't great..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Beside me is the locking mechanism for the door up ahead."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "For these doors, you need to enter the correct combination ino the lock to open it."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Clues as to the combination can be found in the environment."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Further to the right is Arn's shop, where you can buy consumables such as arrows and health potions."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Those purple pulsing runes on the floor prevent monsters from entering, so you're safe in there."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Your swordsmanship is no match for me, Grasshopper!"
